Module tokenizer¶

This document describes all classes of the module tokenizer.

Performs tokenization.

Classes¶

Tokenizer

Class¶

class scisum.domain.tokenizer.Tokenizer¶
Variables

max_length (int) – Length of texts used to split the text

Methods¶

Tokenizer.load_tokenizer(model: str)¶
Parameters

model (str) – model from which we want to load the tokenizer

Returns

tokenizer – The tokenizer

Return type

transformers.PreTrainedTokenizer

Tokenizer.split_text(text: str) → List[Tuple]¶
Parameters

text (str) – Text to split

Returns

text_split – List of tuple for each split of the text First element is the text part and second element is the number of tokens for this split

Return type

list

Bartscisum
